title: Lol Installer not working
body: I'm on windows vista and lol was working completely fine, my PC was getting kinda full so i did a factory reset. After reinstalling everything i go to the league of legends website and try to install league. When i go to my downloads and click on the installer nothing happens. Please help.

replies.body:
First make sure that you're downloading the Windows version of the installer and that your Windows is up to date. 

If you're still having issues, it's most likely because your pc doesn't have the right permissions to launch it. Let's try going through our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to be sure that your pc has access to the installer.

Feel free to hit me up if you have any questions!
